abstract: The Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association and the International Swaps and Derivatives Association contend that the Commodity Futures Trading Commission failed to evaluate the economic impact of its position limits rule.
snippet: The Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association and the International Swaps and Derivatives Association contend that the Commodity Futures Trading Commission failed to evaluate the economic impact of its position limits rule.

headline.main: Wall St. Groups Sue Regulator to Challenge New Trading Rule

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Assn
